data.text:
(3/3) #CivilSociety, share your call to action:

📢 How do we build #VaccineEquity for the #COVID19 pandemic and beyond?

Write your answer and tag your leaders, governments and #bigpharma!

#WorldImmunizationWeek https://t.co/q4dZC231A5

(2/3) Coordinated by @peoplesvaccine, more than 170 former heads of state and government and Nobel laureates called on @POTUS to support waiving intellectual property for #COVID19 vaccines. 

Read more: https://t.co/5k22HFKKVZ  

#PeoplesVaccine #VaccinesWork
